sentence.Network_en: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.

sentence.Network_en: The violence in her tone gave Alistair a shock.

sentence.Network_en: Kevin was always level-headed with both feet on the ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 凯文总是头脑冷静，脚踏实地。
